articles: • How to Handle an Accident Case from Beginning to End
description:
The Law Offices of Adam M. Thompson, P.C., in Morristown, New Jersey, handles personal injury cases for people who have suffered harm due to another's negligence, recklessness or disregard for life. Mr. Thompson has more than 25 years of experience in trial and appeals courts, achieving millions for clients in verdicts and settlements.

The firm helps clients to pursue justice and the maximum compensation the law allows to put them on the path to physical, emotional and financial recovery. Clients turn to Mr. Thompson when they have sustained injuries involving:

  • Car and trucking accidents
  • Aviation and mass transit accidents
  • Premises liability incidents
  • Animal attacks
  • Slip/trip and fall accidents
  • Dangerous drugs
  • Medical malpractice
  • Birth injuries
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Brain injuries
  • Defective products
  • Construction accidents
  • Asbestos mesothelioma cases
  • Toxic torts
  • Class actions and mass torts

When an accident results in death, the firm assists family members in obtaining reparations for their losses.

The law office also offers skilled defense in criminal cases involving white-collar crimes such as embezzlement, fraud and securities-related offenses. For clients accused of sex offenses, drug crimes, violent crimes and DUI/DWI, the firm provides aggressive representation, fighting charges and seeking the outcome that preserves clients' freedom and their future.

Through free initial consultations, virtual appointments and credit card payment options, the Law Offices of Adam M. Thompson, P.C., demonstrates the team's willingness to provide accessible services to clients in New Jersey and throughout New York State, as well.
